title: Logomotion is back (Clearence)
content:
**Hello Typophiles!**  
---------------------------------------------  
Logomotion is back! (just for 45 days)  
---------------------------------------------

[**'Logomotion'** by Fernando Díaz](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317094722/http:/tipotype.com/logomotion/), just for $19

If you'd like to **support the type designers** please purchase directly at [**TipoType.com (Logomotion)**](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317094722/http:/tipotype.com/logomotion/) where the designer gets 80% of every sale.

[![Logomotion](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317094722im_/http:/tipotype.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Logomotion_1.png "Logomotion")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317094722/http:/tipotype.com/logomotion/)

[![Logomotion](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317094722im_/http:/tipotype.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Logomotion_3.png "Logomotion")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317094722/http:/tipotype.com/logomotion/)

[![Logomotion](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317094722im_/http:/tipotype.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Logomotion_2.png "Logomotion")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317094722/http:/tipotype.com/logomotion/)

[![Logomotion](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317094722im_/http:/tipotype.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Logomotion_4.png "Logomotion")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317094722/http:/tipotype.com/logomotion/)

[![Logomotion](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317094722im_/http:/tipotype.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Logomotion_5.png "Logomotion")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317094722/http:/tipotype.com/logomotion/)

[![Logomotion](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317094722im_/http:/tipotype.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Logomotion_6.png "Logomotion")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317094722/http:/tipotype.com/logomotion/)
